original: Lundvall, Nils Magnus Oscar, stads-notarie, Halmstad, f. 7/1/08 i Köinge, Hall. 1. G. 35 m. Gunborg Persson. Barn: Lena f. 39, Leif 41. — Stud:ex. i Landskrona 28, jur. kand. i Lund 35. Tingstjg. i Västmanl. mell. doms. 35-38, tf. drätselnot. i Västerås 38-39, stadsnotarie i Halmstad fr. 39.
translated: Lundvall, Nils Magnus Oscar, city clerk, Halmstad, born on January 7, 1908 in Köinge, Halland. First marriage in 1935 to Gunborg Persson. Children: Lena, born in 1939, and Leif, born in 1941. Education: Graduated from upper secondary school in Landskrona in 1928, graduated with a law degree from Lund University in 1935. Worked as a judicial clerk in Västmanland County Court from 1935 to 1938, acting finance officer in Västerås from 1938 to 1939, and city clerk in Halmstad from 1939 onwards.
